modName: Greybeards Robes Playable and Optional Dark Retexture
summary: Greybeard\'s robes, hood, and boots, AND people no longer think you\'re naked when wearing it.
descriptionHtml:
MAIN FILE:
Included is an esp to make the boots, robes, hood, and head-bandages playable.  The batch file included adds the boots, robes, and hood.  If you want head-bandages, I suppose you could open the console and type:  \"help bandages 0\"

This ESP also fixes the issue where people think you\'re naked when wearing the robes.

Item weights:
Hood:  0
Robes:  5
Boots:   0

How to use:
1:  Extract Greybeard Playable.rar into your Skyrim directory.
2:  Move \"Greybeard Playable.esp\" into your Skyrim->Data folder.
3:  Run Skyrim
4:  Open the dev-console with the tilde (~) key.
5:  Type \"BAT Greybeard\" without the quotations.
6:  Hit Enter
7:  Close the console by hitting the tilde (~) key again.
8:  Enjoy.



If you can\'t get it to work, just let me know, and I\'ll help you out.

Optional Retexture:  Unpack into your Skyrim directory.

I\'m not very good at this apparently.  I think I messed up the alphas.  It appears fine indoors, but outdoors it is very dark.  I\'ll fiddle with it more.
author: Prophet7676

files.name: Playable Greybeards Robes with Naked Fix
files.fileName: Playable Greybeards Robes with Naked Fix-487-3.rar
